product_title: VOLTAS Vectra 4 in 1 Convertible 1.5 Ton 5 Star Inverter Split AC with Anti Dust Filter (Copper Condenser)
overview_text:
Rapid Cooling Solution
The VOLTAS 185V Vectra Elite 1.5-Ton Split Air Conditioner delivers an airflow volume of up to 547CFM, making it an appropriate choice for large spaces measuring up to 180Sq.Ft. Plus, featuring a Super Dry mode, this AC can effectively reduce excessive humidity in the room, ensuring a comfortable and moisture-free environment.
Turbo Cooling Function
Thanks to its Turbo Cooling function, this split air conditioner makes sure that your room cools down quickly and efficiently, providing relief from the heat within minutes of turning it on. So, when you come home after an exhausting day at work, you can turn this AC on and feel rejuvenated in no time.
4-in-1 Convertible Mode
Experience the convenience of the 4-in-1 convertible mode in this AC, which lets you modify the cooling capacity to save energy while maintaining your comfort.
Sleep Mode
With the sleep mode feature in this air conditioner, you can experience optimal cooling, designed to enhance comfort during nighttime use. It can offer a quiet, energy-efficient operation.
High EER Rotary BLDC Compressor
Housing a strong high EER rotary BLDC compressor, this 1.5-ton AC is built to deliver dependable cooling and high durability. Moreover, for a budget-conscious and environment-friendly cooling solution, consider this air conditioner with a 5-star rating. By consuming less energy, this AC can help lower carbon emissions, thereby reducing your carbon footprint.
Copper Condenser Coil
Designed with a copper condenser coil, this VOLTAS air conditioner maximises heat exchange efficiency, delivering swift and efficient cooling for your room.
Antimicrobial, Antibacterial, and Anti-Dust Filter
Fitted with an efficient antimicrobial, antibacterial, and anti-dust filter, this AC is equipped to remove dust, allergens, and other airborne impurities to maintain good air quality.
Auto-Restart Function
With its auto-restart function, this AC automatically resumes operation after power disruptions, maintaining your desired indoor climate.
R32 Refrigerant
This air conditioner, with its R32 refrigerant, ensures eco-friendly and effective cooling performance.
Stabiliser-Free Operation
No external stabiliser is required for this air conditioner, thanks to its stabiliser-free operation.
Inverter-Friendly AC
As this AC is inverter-compatible, it keeps you cool even during power outages.
key_features: 1.5 Ton Inverter Split AC, 5 Star Rating
1 Year Comprehensive Warranty, 10 Years Compressor Warranty
High Ambient Cooling, Anti Microbial Air Filteration
